during a Thursday conference call with analysts, with Eric Schmidt describing Google's co-founders as his ''best friends.'' ''I believe Larry is ready'' to be CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call. It's time for him to have a shot at running this. Page hailed Eric Schmidt as a ''tremendous leader'' whose contributions exceeded all expectations. ''There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done,'' Page said.
